successes.title: Tablescapes - by Secret Weapon Miniatures
successes.description:
Secret Weapon's plastic Tablescape Tiles fit on any table or flat
surface to create the ultimate miniature gaming environment.

Pledges.description: T-Shirt - one Secret Weapon t-shirt and our eternal gratitude! (Price includes shipping.)
Display Board - one four tile set from any of the unlocked themes, enough to make a 2x2' display board. (Price includes international shipping)
Display Board - one four tile set from any of the unlocked themes, enough to make a 2x2' display board. (Price includes international shipping)
Skirmisher - One complete 16 tile set, enough to create a 4x4' tabletop. Early Bird special! (Price includes shipping.)
Skirmisher - One complete 16 tile set, enough to create a 4x4' tabletop. (Price includes shipping.)
Mini-Wargamer - One complete 16 tile set, and one 8 tile set randomly selected from the same theme,  enough to create a 4x6' tabletop. (Price includes shipping.)
Wargamer - Two complete 16 tile sets, enough to create a 4x8' tabletop. Early Bird special!  (Price includes shipping.)
Wargamer - Two complete 16 tile sets, enough to create a 4x8' tabletop. (Price includes shipping.)
Skirmisher Deluxe - One complete 16 tile set, enough to create a 4x4' tabletop, AND a full set of the modular wall terrain. (Price includes shipping.)

Mini-Wargamer Deluxe- One complete 16 tile set, and one 8 tile set randomly selected from the same theme,  enough to create a 4x6' tabletop AND a full set of the modular wall terrain. (Price includes shipping.)
Double Mini-Wargamer - Two complete 24 tile sets (16+8 from each theme set, two sets total), enough to create TWO 4x6' tabletop. (Price includes international shipping.)
Wargame Deluxe - Two complete 16 tile sets, enough to create a 4x8' tabletop AND a full set of the modular wall terrain. (Price includes shipping.)
Double Wargamer - FOUR complete 16 tile sets from any of the unlocked themes, enough to create TWO 4x8' tabletops! (Price includes international shipping)

Double Mini-Wargamer Deluxe - Two complete 24 tile sets (16+8 from each theme set, two sets total), enough to create TWO 4x6' tabletop. AND two full sets of the modular wall terrain! (Price includes international shipping.)

Double Wargamer Deluxe - FOUR complete 16 tile sets from any of the unlocked themes, enough to create TWO 4x8' tabletops! AND two full sets of the modular wall terrain! (Price includes international shipping)
